doc:
Fred Berry https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fred_Berry 0 Fred Allen Berry (March 19, 1951 – October 21, 2003) was an American actor and street dancer. He was best known for the role of Fred "Rerun" Stubbs on the 1970s television show What's Happening!! Fred_Allen_Berry ( March_19_,_1951 – October_21_,_2003 ) was an_American_actor_and_street_dancer . He was_best_known for the_role of Fred_"_Rerun_"_Stubbs on the_1970s_television_show What 's_Happening !!
